text: Typographic Workers Trade Union (in Spanish: Sindicato de Obreros Tipógrafos) was a trade union of typographers in Spain. Founded in 1897, it was the first Catholic trade union in the country. ==Sources== * La Organización Sindical Española, Escuela Sindical 1961. 1961: Madrid, page 27. Category:Trade unions in Spain Category:Trade unions established in 1897 Category:Catholic trade unions Category:Printing trade unions
title: Typographic Workers Trade Union
